property.name: applicationDir
property.description: The folder used for installing file-based-applications, relative to the webapp-root

property.name: cacheApplicationFolder
property.description: The folder for the application-cache, relative to platform.cacheFolder. Applications might use this folder to cache temporary data.

property.name: cacheFolder
property.description: The cache folder, relative to WEB-INF. Contains the platform.cacheFolder and the platform.cacheApplicationFolder.

property.name: cacheImageFolder
property.description: The folder used for caching images, within the application-cache

property.name: cachePlatformFolder
property.description: The folder for the platform-cache, relative to platform.cacheFolder. The platform cache is used by appNG to cache application resources.
